introduction: Netflix has struck a deal with music icon Julio Iglesias to produce a series about the star’s life.An announcement for the deal noted this marks the first time the artist has participated in the creative process on production about his life and musical trajectory. The agreement was signed after Netflix Chief Content Officer Bela Bajaria wrote Iglesias a letterDetails on the series are limited, but it will launch globally and is currently in development.According to Netflix, it will “tell the story of how Julio Iglesias became the first non-English artist to enter the American and Asian markets and turned into a universal star who is among the five biggest record sellers in history.”
